name: google-researcher-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol server for research and web access

scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npm run test:e2e:stdio && echo 'Attempting to kill process on port 3000...' && (PID_TO_KILL=$(lsof -ti tcp:3000) && kill $PID_TO_KILL || echo 'No process found on port 3000.') && sleep 2 && echo 'Starting server for SSE test...' && npm run start & SERVER_PID=$! && echo "Server PID: $SERVER_PID" && sleep 10 && echo 'Running SSE test...' && npm run test:e2e:sse ; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$? ; echo 'Killing SSE test server (PID: $SERVER_PID)...' && kill $SERVER_PID && exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
